title: YouTube PetMel Comment Bot
description: Automatically reply to comments on your YouTube channel.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

privacy.sections.1.title: 1. Introduction
privacy.sections.1.body: Welcome to YouTube PetMel Comment Bot. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application.
privacy.sections.2.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacy.sections.2.body: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and any other data required for authentication via Google OAuth.
privacy.sections.3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
privacy.sections.3.body: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, personalize user experience, and ensure account security.
privacy.sections.4.title: 4. Data Sharing
privacy.sections.4.body: We do not sell, trade, or rent users' personal identification information to others. However, we may share information with Google services to provide authentication.
privacy.sections.5.title: 5. Data Security
privacy.sections.5.body: We implement security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.sections.6.title: 6. Third-Party Services
privacy.sections.6.body: Our app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy policies of these third parties.
privacy.sections.7.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacy.sections.7.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
privacy.sections.8.title: 8. Contact Us
privacy.sections.8.body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at richhowardrich@gmail.com.
